item.title: First own package on userrepository.eu
item.description: Until now, userrepository.eu only used software from AUR. Today, to get me distracted from the flu and a respiratory infection I got a few days ago, I’ve finally created my first package for Arch Linux on my repository. It’s for a GTK web browser named Eoli and it builds from the master git branch. Here’s the PKGBUILD at the time of writing: # Maintainer: Bruno Miguel ​ pkgname=eolie-git _gitname=eolie pkgver=da1899ff pkgrel=1 pkgdesc=“Simple GTK web browser for GNOME” arch=(‘x86_64’) url=“https://wiki.
